sn9.4:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu viharanti aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9.4:1.2: Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṃvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu.
sn9.4:1.3: Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā te bhikkhū apassantī paridevamānā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn9.4:3.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññatarā devatā taṃ devataṃ gāthāya paccabhāsi:
